name: Sexy City
description:
This is a game for couple.

By traveling through the gameboard, representing a city, you will be able to acquire businesses and even luxury villas. When your partner will land on one of your shops, he / she will have a special forfeit... If you break into a private villa, you can expect a few surprises if the owner catches you. The city has many atypical locations such as gym, restaurant or video studio that will bring you to acrobatic discoveries or prove your photographic skills.

The game will reserve you one last surprise. After your party, you will discover how it will also spice up the following days...
